title: Your oasis away from work
posting_body: ['Spacious Renovated Unit with Condo Finishes, Panoramic Views, High Ceilings, Outstanding Amenities', 'Listing ID #: 432728', 'Price: $3,450', 'Property Type: Rental', 'Bedrooms: Flex 1', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Elevator', 'New Construction', 'Laundry', 'Bicycle Room', 'Courtyard', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Walls OK', 'Dishwasher', 'Washer', 'Hardwood', 'High Ceilings', 'Renovated', 'Marble Bath', 'Granite Kitchen', 'Light', 'Eat In Kitchen', 'Negotiable Fee', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'City View', 'This amazing convertible one exemplifies the meaning of luxury.', 'Laid with long oak hardwood flooring that helps reflect the organic lighting provided by its floor to ceiling, panoramic windows.', 'The chefs kitchen comes fully equipped with state of the art stainless steel appliances which are encased by its fine granite counter tops and custom cabinetry.', 'The marble bath possess a large soothing bath with rain shower head, natural stone sink and mirror medicine cabinetry that is illuminated by its studio like glow by its vanity.', '\xa0Flex 1 *Photos Resemble Finishes*', 'Building Amenities: 24-7 Doorman Concierge Fitness Centers Roof Top Pet Bath Residential Lounge', 'To schedule a showing, Contact Rene Garcia By Phone: (718)902-0642 By E-mail:', 'rene garcia', 'Phone: 7189020642', 'Mobile: 7189020642', 'Fax: (646) 893-2718', 'NY RENT OWN SELL \xa0 7189020642 \xa0 7189020642 \xa0 FAX (646) 893-2718', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text rene garcia at 7189020642', '2719']
